title: The Sum Of His Worth
description: THE SUM OF HIS WORTH is a Southern gothic thriller set in the violent 1950s in an Alabama town wrought with corruption and ruled by a virulent Ku Klux Klan.The story is told by a free-spirited white boy who, after witnessing a lynching and hungry to leave behind his deprived and now desperate life, befriends a progressive doctor who’s fighting to free the town’s black community. In a compassionate and terrifying story that sees both “Doctor Joe” and the boy suffer betrayals, beatings, arrest and exile in a story of undecorated truths and uplifting hope.
author: Ron Argo
